title: FAX
description: Fax is a communication type used in customer communication. Fax includes the full fax number, including area code, etc.

usageTypeName.title: communicationChannelUsageType.term
usageTypeName.description: Term is a human readable designator of the data record for this object.

numberComplete.title: faxNumberComplete
numberComplete.description: The Complete Fax Number. That means dialing code + number + extension.

isStandardFaxNumber.title: isStandardFaxNumber
isStandardFaxNumber.description: This field indicates that this Fax Number is the Standard Phone Number for a defined use.

countryIso2Code.title: faxCountry.alpha-2Code
countryIso2Code.description: The Alpha-2 code according to ISO 3166-1

countryCallingCode.title: faxCountry.countryCallingCode
countryCallingCode.description: Country calling codes or country dial in codes are telephone dialing prefixes for the member countries or regions of the International Telecommunication Union (ITU). They are defined by the ITU-T in standards E.123 and E.164. The prefixes enable international direct dialing (IDD), and are also referred to as international subscriber dialing (ISD) codes.

countryRefId.title: faxCountry.referenceDataId
countryRefId.description: The Reference Data ID is the (technical) Identifier of all REFERNCE DATA maintained in the Reference Data Management System.

doNotUseFlag.title: doNotUseFlag
doNotUseFlag.description: The Do not Use Flag indicates that a particular Communication Number is Not Used.
